definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
fillet beef served sizzling on a hot iron plate

sentences.english: Hmm…Black pepper beef, fried shrimp and hot&sour soup.
sentences.chinese: 嗯黑胡椒牛柳，油煎大虾，再来个酸辣汤吧。

sentences.english: Fry beef tenderloin in wok over medium heat until well done.
sentences.chinese: 将牛柳落镬，用中火煎至熟透。

sentences.english: The guests consume over 500yuan compliment mixed sushi or tenderloin.
sentences.chinese: 一次性消费满五百元赠送寿司拼盘或特级牛柳一份。

sentences.english: Food Suggestions: Pairs perfectly with red meat, cheeses, sizzling pepper beef and roast duck.
sentences.chinese: 与红肉，干酪，黑椒牛柳和烤鸭堪称绝配。

sentences.english: Heat 3 tbsp garlic oil in wok, shallow-fry the beef fillet until 70%done. Remove.
sentences.chinese: 镬内烧3汤匙蒜片油，把牛柳煎至七成熟，取出。

sentences.english: Pepper crusted beef tenderloin, red wine jus, mushroom flan, and vegetable fries.
sentences.chinese: 黑胡椒牛柳，红酒沙司，蘑菇饼，和炸蔬菜条。

sentences.english: Refrigerate the roll for at least an hour to make sure the beef log will hold its shape.
sentences.chinese: 将牛柳卷放进雪柜冷藏最少1小时，才能固定形状。

sentences.english: Baked Australian Beef Fillet, Tomato, Mushroom on Grilled Polenta with Green Vegetable.
sentences.chinese: 焗澳洲牛柳，番茄，蘑菇配以香煎玉米饼及菜心。

sentences.english: Beef tenderloin, Rangers valley, slow roasted, paprika and onions sauce, semolina pudding.
sentences.chinese: 慢烤澳洲牛柳，辣椒洋葱沙司，小麦布丁。

sentences.english: Cheese can be used as substitute of foie gras.
sentences.chinese: 牛柳内的鹅肝可改用芝士代替。

sentences.english: Rub it outside the beef, roll it and freeze.
sentences.chinese: 把它涂抹在牛柳的外面，把牛柳卷起后速冻。

sentences.english: Rub it outside the beef, roll it and freeze.
sentences.chinese: 把它涂抹在牛柳的外面，把牛柳卷起后速冻。

sentences.english: Steak House salad with roasted beef, eggs, cheddar cheese, and spinach.
sentences.chinese: 牛排家沙拉，配烤牛柳，温泉蛋和车达芝士。

sentences.english: Australian Tenderloin and Eggs served with Mushroom and Grilled Tomato.
sentences.chinese: 煎澳洲牛柳，配煎蛋，蘑菇，焗番茄。

sentences.english: Now fold the end flaps. Brush egg wash to seal and encase the beef completely.
sentences.chinese: 在酥皮末端涂上蛋浆，将酥皮紧紧地封好牛柳卷。
